title: Discover Your Next Home!
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Manors at Knollwood is ideally located along 19 Mile Road in charming Clinton Township, MI.
As a resident of our community, you’ll appreciate the convenient access to M-59, I-94 and M-53 for easy access to the best employers, shops, schools and parks in the area.

Our proximity to local hospitals like Henry Ford-Macomb, McLaren-Macomb and Ascension Macomb-Oakland, along with access to the award-winning Chippewa Valley School District, has made Manors at Knollwood an ideal community to call home.

Residents choose Manors at Knollwood, not only for the location, but because it’s a well-maintained community with a 24/7 attended Gatehouse entry, Resort Style Amenities and the reputation for providing superior resident service.
